abstract: The Reader’s Digest Association announced on Monday that it would file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection for its United States businesses within 30 days.
snippet: The Reader’s Digest Association announced on Monday that it would file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection for its United States businesses within 30 days.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE Aug. 17, 3:52 p.m. With comments from the Reader’s Digest Association chief financial officer, Tom Williams, and on the banks’ involvement.
